testcase.name: Successfully create an account with default balance
testcase.system-out: Given I create an account with CBU 123456789 and alias "iAmAccount".........passed Then The account balance should be 0.0......................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully create an account with an initial balance
testcase.system-out: Given I create an account with CBU 987654321, alias "iAmAccount" and a balance of 500.0.passed Then The account balance should be 500.0....................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully deposit money into an account
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmAccount" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I deposit 200.0 into the account.......................................passed Then The account balance should be 1200.0...................................passed

testcase.name: Cannot deposit a negative amount
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmAccount" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I try to deposit -100.0 into the account...............................passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The account balance should remain 1000.0................................passed

testcase.name: Successfully transfer money from one account to another through alias
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer 100.0 into the other account through its alias..............passed Then The sender account balance should be 900.0.............................passed And The receiver account balance should be 1100.0...........................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer more money than balance available through alias
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer 1100.0 into the other account through its alias.............passed Then The operation should be denied due to insufficient funds...............passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer a negative amount through alias
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer -100.0 into the other account through its alias.............passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer a zero amount through alias
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer 0.0 into the other account through its alias................passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer to an account with no alias
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333 and no alias......................passed When I transfer 100.0 into the other account through its alias..............passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer from one's account to the same one through alias
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And The same account as receiver............................................passed When I transfer 100.0 into the same account through its alias...............passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Successfully transfer money from one account to another through cbu
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer 100.0 into the other account through its CBU................passed Then The sender account balance should be 900.0.............................passed And The receiver account balance should be 1100.0...........................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer more money than balance available through cbu
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer 1100.0 into the other account through its CBU...............passed Then The operation should be denied due to insufficient funds...............passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer a negative amount through cbu
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer -100.0 into the other account through its CBU...............passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer a zero amount through cbu
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with CBU 111222333, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I transfer 0.0 into the other account through its CBU..................passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer to an account with no cbu
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmReceiver" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And A receiver account with no CBU and alias "iAmReceiver"..................passed When I transfer 100.0 into the other account through its CBU................passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed

testcase.name: Cannot transfer from one's account to the same one through cbu
testcase.system-out: Given A sender account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmSender" and a balance of 1000.0.passed And The same account as receiver............................................passed When I transfer 100.0 into the same account through its CBU.................passed Then The operation should be denied.........................................passed And The sender account balance should remain 1000.0.........................passed And The receiver account balance should remain 1000.0.......................passed

testcase.name: Successfully withdraw money when the balance is sufficient
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmAccount" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I withdraw 300.0 from the account......................................passed Then The account balance should be 700.0....................................passed

testcase.name: Cannot withdraw more money than available balance
testcase.system-out: Given An account with CBU 123456789, alias "iAmAccount" and a balance of 1000.0.passed When I try to withdraw 1100.0 from the account..............................passed Then The operation should be denied due to insufficient funds...............passed And The account balance should remain 1000.0................................passed
